It include 220 patient Fundación Neumológica Colombiana live Bogotá accept participation signing informed consent . The subject randomly assign receive LTOT follow 30 month . At baseline 10 , 20 30 month , clinically evaluate arterial blood gas , pulse oximetry , echocardiography , spirometry bronchodilator , diffusion capacity , quality life ( SGRQ ) , neurocognitive performance ( MMSE ) six minute walk test . The primary outcome evaluate ratio occurrence erythrocytosis pulmonary hypertension . Secondary outcomes evaluate quality life , lung function , neurocognitive performance exercise tolerance compare group without LTOT .
